text:
These kcups are not sealed correctly and as a result the fail. Top seal opens up and sometimes the filter inside shifts and grinds jam up the coffeemaker. Many of the cups are stale as a result of the poor seal. I purchased 4 different Brooklyn Bean Roastery flavors and they all had the same issue.
Company was contacted and quick to send replacement, unfortunately these also failed and many were stale. Hope they correct their product.
